sentences.en: A lot of nonsense was talked, under the guise of philosophy.
sentences.cn: 假借哲学的名义讲了一大堆的废话.

sentences.en: A man appeared at the castle gate in the guise of a woodcutter.
sentences.cn: 有个人装扮成樵夫的样子出现在城堡大门口.

sentences.en: Everyone writes of them in one guise or another.
sentences.cn: 每个人都以这样那样的方式写这个题材.

sentences.en: For most of the Guise family, religious zealotry was not a motive.
sentences.cn: 所以对于大多数的吉斯家族, 宗教狂热并不是动机.

sentences.en: He is an enemy in a friendly guise.
sentences.cn: 他是个装扮成朋友的敌人.

sentences.en: He turned up at a fancy dress Easter dance in the guise of a white rabbit.
sentences.cn: 他扮成白兔在复活节化装舞会上亮相。

sentences.en: His speech presented racist ideas under the guise of nationalism.
sentences.cn: 他的讲话以民族主义为幌子宣扬种族主义思想。

sentences.en: It’s the same idea in a different guise.
sentences.cn: 还是一样的观点，只是形式不同。

sentences.en: One who betrays another under the guise of friendship.
sentences.cn: 叛徒假装友好暗地出卖他人的人.

sentences.en: Seizure of Aboriginal lands under the guise of nationalization.
sentences.cn: 二.以国有化之名掠夺原住民族土地的暴力.

sentences.en: The thief came into the house under the guise of a repairman.
sentences.cn: 那小偷扮成个修理匠进了屋子.

sentences.en: There is nothing new here, just the same old ideas in a new guise.
sentences.cn: 这里没什么新花样, 只是些改头换面的旧玩意儿.

sentences.en: They got into the school in the guise of inspectors.
sentences.cn: 他们假装成视察员进了学校.

sentences.en: Under the guise of active wits they will lead us to the parental meditation of antics.
sentences.cn: 而且他们还会披上活跃的智慧的外衣,引导我们以慈父的目光看待他们的恶作剧.

sentences.en: We have lost too more to learn anything except the guise.
sentences.cn: 我们失去了太多,只学会了伪装.

phrases.tran_cn: 假借；假装；以…为幌子；在…的幌子下

trans.tran_cn: 〈古〉装束，外衣，形象，化身，伪装，借口
trans.tran_en: the way someone or something appears to be, which hides the truth or is only temporary
